JOOX Music

Brief: Dive into an ocean of melodies with JOOX Music, the ultimate music streaming app designed to cater to your auditory cravings anytime, anywhere. JOOX Music offers a vast music library, over 50 radio stations, personalized playlists, and much more, ensuring there's always a song for every moment.
